title: Zaszx's Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dark]] [[>]] [[module Rate]] [[/>]] ++ My Work: [[html]]
[[/html]] || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shitty-morning Shitty Morning] || Tale || Comedy || The Administrator has a personal "incident," and now has to go on a stealth mission to safety. Site-01 has other plans for him. || || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8677 SCP-8677] || SCP || Comedy || An anomalous TV remote causes humiliating incidents for high ranking Foundation personnel. || || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/climbing-the-ladder Promotion] || Tale || Comedy || A researcher gets a mysterious letter telling him he has been assigned as the Administrator of the Foundation.|| || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/agent-in-orange Agent In Orange] || Tale || Mystery || A D-Class requests a meeting with the Ethics Committee and reveals he is an undercover MTF Omega-1 agent. || [[html]]

[[/html]] ++ Coming Next: [[html]]
[[/html]] || Shitty Afternoon || Tale || Comedy || The Administrator thinks his previous personal "incident" is over. He is very wrong. || || Fluffy || SCP || Comedy || Site-XX is designated to contain Safe class anomalies. An emergency alert gets triggered when a Keter class SCP file is uploaded from that site. || || Dreams || SCP|| Mystery || Site-XX personnel start dying in their sleep. Things get escalated when the site director dies. A team is assigned to investigate. || || Welcome to Site-0 || Tale || Mystery || Foundation attempts to terminate 096 by exposing it to Gate Guardian. The attempt goes horribly wrong. ||
author: Zaszx
